text: tatha kahenge jo nirbal honge, unase, jo bade (ahankaaree) hongehbalki raat-din ke shadyantr[1] ne (aisa kiya), jab tum hamen aadesh de rahe the ki ham kufr karen allaah ke saath tatha banaayen usake saajhee tatha ve apane man mein pachhataayenge, jab yaatana dekhenge aur ham tauq daal denge unake galon mein, jo kaafir ho gaye, ve nahin badala diye jaayenge, parantu usee ka, jo ve kar rahe the
